query.name: FetchUsers
query.sql: SELECT Id, Name, Email, CreatedDate FROM Users ORDER BY CreatedDate DESC

query.name: InsertUser
query.sql: INSERT INTO Users (Name, Email, CreatedDate) VALUES (@Name, @Email, @CreatedDate)

query.name: FetchTasksByUser
query.sql: SELECT Id, Title, Description, Status, CreatedDate, DueDate FROM Tasks WHERE UserId = @UserId ORDER BY DueDate

query.name: InsertTask
query.sql: INSERT INTO Tasks (Title, Description, Status, UserId, CreatedDate, DueDate) VALUES (@Title, @Description, @Status, @UserId, @CreatedDate, @DueDate)

query.name: UpdateTaskStatus
query.sql: UPDATE Tasks SET Status = @Status WHERE Id = @Id
